/* 렌탈CB 연체이력 조회 */ SELECT DISTINCT X.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , T2.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T2.COPN_DV_CD /*법인격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'COPN_DV_CD', T2.COPN_DV_CD) AS COPN_DV_NM /*법인격구분명*/ , T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대폰번호1*/ , T2.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대폰번호2*/ , T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대폰번호3*/ , (CASE WHEN X.DLQ_AMT < 0 THEN 0 ELSE X.DLQ_AMT END) AS DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , (CASE WHEN NVL(X.DLQ_BLAM,0) - (T7.DP_RVE_AMT - T7.RFND_RVE_AMT) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(X.DLQ_BLAM,0) - (T7.DP_RVE_AMT - T7.RFND_RVE_AMT) END) AS DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ , T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /*집금담당자번호*/ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL /*T:집금파트너상세*/ WHERE PRTNR_NO = T3.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO AND ROWNUM <= 1) AS PRTNR_KNM /*집금담당자명*/ , '1588-4113' AS DSPH_TNO /*발신번호*/ , X.NICE_FW_DT AS RGST_SCH_DT /*NICE등록예정일자/ , X.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , (CASE WHEN T1.CST_NO IS NULL THEN SUBSTR(T5.FWBOO_DTM,1,8) ELSE '' END) AS MSG_FW_DT /*알림톡발송일자*/ , NVL((SELECT (CASE WHEN RESULT = '1000' THEN 'Y' WHEN RESULT != '1000' THEN 'N' ELSE '' END) FROM ATA_MMT_LOG S1 /*T:알림톡전송이력*/ WHERE S1.MT_PR = T6.MT_PR AND MT_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(MT_SEQ) FROM ATA_MMT_LOG WHERE MT_PR = S1.MT_PR)),'N') AS RESULT_YN /*성공여부*/ , X.NICE_FW_DT /*나이스발송일자*/ FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) AS OC_BSYM /*발생기준년월*/ , A.CST_NO /*고객번호*/ , A.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ , A.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN /*나이스발송제외여부*/ , A.NICE_FW_DT /*나이스발송일자*/ , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_AMT,0)) AS DLQ_AMT /*연체금액*/ , SUM(NVL(A.DLQ_BLAM,0)) AS DLQ_BLAM /*연체잔액*/ FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ A /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B /*T:고객기본*/ ON B.CST_NO = A.CST_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.RENTAL_CB_RGST_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /*렌탈CB등록구분코드-1:발생,3:변동*/ AND A.NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y' /*알림발송대상여부*/ AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.OC_BSDT LIKE #{baseYm}||'%' /*발생기준일자*/
AND A.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /*고객번호*/
AND B.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /*휴대폰번호1*/
AND B.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /*휴대폰번호2-입력된값을 암호화하여 대입*/
AND B.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /*휴대폰번호3*/
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = A.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT) /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/ GROUP BY SUBSTR(A.OC_BSDT,1,6) , A.CST_NO , A.NOTY_TRS_DT , A.NICE_FW_EXCD_YN , A.NICE_FW_DT ) X LEFT JOIN (SELECT CST_NO FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/ ) T1 ON T1.CST_NO = X.CST_NO INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 /*T:고객기본*/ ON T2.CST_NO = X.CST_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , CST_NO , BASE_YM , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BASE_YM, CST_NO ORDER BY CST_NO) AS RANK_NUM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS WHERE BND_BIZ_DV_CD IN ('L20','L21') /*채권업무구분코드-L21:리스*/ AND CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO IS NOT NULL AND BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') ) T3 /*T:채권계약기본*/ ON T3.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND T3.RANK_NUM = 1 LEFT JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL C1 /* T:계약결제관계 */ ON C1.DTL_CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND C1.DTL_CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C1.VL_STRT_DTM AND C1.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS T4 /* T:계약결제기본 */ ON T4.CNTR_STLM_ID = C1.CNTR_STLM_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT CST_NO , FST_RGST_DTM , BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 , BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 , FW_BIZ_NM , BND_MSG_RELY_ID , FWBOO_DTM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY BND_MSG_RELY_ID ORDER BY FST_RGST_DTM DESC) RANK_NUM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_MSG_RELY_IZ WHERE FW_BIZ_NM = 'BN_KAKAO_MESSAGE' /*발송업무명*/ AND MSG_FW_TP_CD = '01' /*메시지발송유형코드-01:카카오알림톡*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 = 'B' /*채권알림톡업무코드-B:등록관련*/ AND BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 = 'B05' /*채권알림톡업무상세코드-B05:렌탈CB연체정보등록 예고*/ ) T5 /*T:채권메시지중계내역*/ ON T5.CST_NO = X.CST_NO AND SUBSTR(T5.FST_RGST_DTM,1,8) = X.NOTY_TRS_DT /*알림전송일자*/ AND T5.RANK_NUM = 1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATA_MMT_TRAN WHERE TEMPLATE_CODE = 'wells18153' /*템플릿코드*/) T6 /*T:알림톡전송*/ ON T6.RESERVED2 = T5.BND_MSG_RELY_ID /*채권메시지중계ID*/ AND T6.RESERVED3 = T5.FW_BIZ_NM /*발송업무명*/ AND T6.RESERVED4 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL1 /*채권알림톡업무코드*/ AND T6.RESERVED5 = T5.BND_MSG_TP_VAL2 /*채권알림톡업무상세코드*/ LEFT JOIN LATERAL (SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('1','3') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS DP_RVE_AMT /*입금금액*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD IN ('2','4') THEN NVL(RVE_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END),0) AS RFND_RVE_AMT /*환불금액*/ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL /*T:수납상세*/ WHERE CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND RVE_DV_CD NOT IN ('09','10') /*수납구분코드->09:대손,10:손료*/ AND DP_MES_CD IN ('01','02') /*입금수단코드-01:현금,02:신용카드*/ AND (RVE_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),1),'YYYYMM')||'01' AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{baseYm},'YYYYMM'),1),'YYYYMM')||LPAD(T4.MPY_BSDT,2,'0')) ) T7 ON 1=1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND X.OC_BSYM = #{baseYm} AND NVL(X.DLQ_BLAM,0) - (T7.DP_RVE_AMT - T7.RFND_RVE_AMT) > 0 ORDER BY X.CST_NO
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND OC_BSDT LIKE #{baseYm}||'%' AND NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y' /*알림발송대상여부*/ AND NOTY_TRS_DT IS NOT NULL AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

/* 렌탈CB 연체정보 조회 - 알림톡 전송일자 갱신 */ UPDATE TB_CBBO_WELLS_RENTAL_CB_DLQ_IZ A /*T:WELLS렌탈CB연체내역*/ SET A.NOTY_TRS_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND A.OC_BSDT LIKE #{baseYm}||'%' AND A.NOTY_FW_OJ_YN = 'Y' AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTC_EXCD_OJ_IZ /*T:채권접촉제외대상내역*/ WHERE CST_NO = A.CST_NO AND CTNT_EXCD_BND_BIZ_CD = '02' /*연락제외채권업무코드-02:렌탈CB*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT /*적용시작일자~종료일자*/)
